title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         Photo courtesy of www.unitao.com  Prepare yourself for 2,000 foot tall, narrow canyon walls dropping almost vertically to the Gunnison River. The Black Canyon is known for crumbling rock, dizzying heights, and a lack of places to place protective equipment. Rock climbing is a challenge limited to highly experienced, expert climbers only.
